original_text: And when you have crossed over the Jordan, you shall set up these stones, concerning which I command you today, on Mount Ebal, and you shall plaster them with plaster.
korean_text: 너희가 요단을 건너거든 내가 오늘 너희에게 명령하는 이 돌들을 에발 산에 세우고 그 위에 석회를 바를 것이며

sentences.original_text: And when you have crossed over the Jordan,
you shall set up these stones,
concerning which I command you today,
sentences.korean_translation: 오늘 내가 너에게 명하는 것에 관하여,

sentences.original_text: and you shall plaster them with plaster.
